comment.text: This translation key is used to display the content "Storage" in various places throughout the application, such as on a user's profile page or in an info panel. The text appears when displaying storage information and quotas for users. It provides context for translators to ensure consistency in language usage.

usage.context:
showStorageInfo &&
 columns.splice(columns.length, 0, {
 key: "Storage",
 title:
 isDefaultRoomsQuotaSet && !isArchiveFolder
 ? t("Common:StorageAndQuota")
 : t("Common:Storage"),
 enable: roomQuotaColumnIsEnable,
 sortBy: SortByFieldName.UsedSpace,
 resizable: true,
 onChange: this.onColumnChange,

showStorageInfo &&
 columns.splice(columns.length, 0, {
 key: "Storage",
 title:
 isDefaultRoomsQuotaSet && !isArchiveFolder
 ? t("Common:StorageAndQuota")
 : t("Common:Storage"),
 enable: roomQuotaColumnIsEnable,
 sortBy: SortByFieldName.UsedSpace,
 resizable: true,
 onChange: this.onColumnChange,

showStorageInfo &&
 columns.splice(columns.length, 0, {
 key: "Storage",
 title:
 isDefaultRoomsQuotaSet && !isArchiveFolder
 ? t("Common:StorageAndQuota")
 : t("Common:Storage"),
 enable: roomQuotaColumnIsEnable,
 sortBy: SortByFieldName.UsedSpace,
 resizable: true,
 onChange: this.onColumnChange,

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Yaddaş" can mean memory, in the context of 'Storage' (as in data storage or storage space), it's not the most accurate translation. A more suitable translation would be something like 'Saxlama' or 'Əməliyyat yaddaşı'. "Yaddaş" primarily refers to memory as in recalling information.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Saxlama' or 'Əməliyyat yaddaşı' instead of 'Yaddaş'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Αποθ. χώρος' is a valid Greek term related to storage, it's more literal (storage space). 'Storage' in this context, as a key name, might benefit from a more concise or general translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Αποθήκευση' (Apothikevsi - Storage/Saving) or 'Χώρος' (Horos - Space) depending on the intended nuance.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Archivio" can sometimes translate to "Storage," it primarily means "Archive." "Storage" can also mean general space for keeping things, which "Archivio" doesn't always convey.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Spazio di archiviazione" (storage space), "Deposito" (depository), or "Magazzino" (warehouse) depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ເກັບມ້ຽນ" (kep muean) can mean 'storage,' it more accurately translates to 'to store' or 'to collect.'  'Storage' as a noun referring to a place or system for storing things, is better conveyed with a different term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "ເຂື່ອນແສກຮັກສາ" (khuen saek haksá) which means 'storage area' or 'warehouse,' or "ບ່ອນເກັບມ້ຽນ" (bon kep muean) which means 'place to store'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Armazenar' is a verb (to store) and not a noun, which aligns with the English word 'Storage'. 'Storage' refers to the capacity to store something, not the act of storing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Storage' as 'Armazenamento' (storage) or 'Espaço de armazenamento' (storage space) depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Armazenar' can mean 'to store', in the context of 'Storage' (as a noun, referring to storage space or facilities), it's not the most accurate translation. It's more of a verb.
The Sinhala translation "ආචයනය" (aachayanaya) does not accurately convey the meaning of "Storage". It generally translates to 'invocation' or 'appeal'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation for "Storage" in Sinhala would depend on the context. Some possibilities include: నిల్వ (Nilwa), ගබඩා (Gabada), or ස්ථානගත කිරීම (Sthaanagathakirima).
